candidates.why: Closest interaction/tool surface: UI-design extraction family; supports refine + interactive; uses Task(ui-design-agent) + Bash/AskUserQuestion similar to layout-extract.
Same explore/refine + variants + interactive selection pattern; differs mainly by not using Task(ui-design-agent).
Shares base_path + design-id/session conventions and writes UI artifacts; complements layout-extract as a downstream consumer of layout templates.
Uses parallel agent analysis and writes intermediates; helpful for patterns around .intermediates/ organization and validation steps.
Orchestrator that composes ui-design subcommands (including layout-extract); useful for conventions around chaining, session folders, and progress reporting.

selected.reason: Most similar allowed-tools and execution structure for an extraction command that delegates deep analysis to Task(ui-design-agent), with optional interactive selection and refinement mode.
